name: Differ By a Vowel Trivia Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Let's say that you were given the following definitions:
Cooking vessel
Stroke
Place
Fruit seed
Domestic animal

That list would lead to the answers
Pot
Pat
Put
Pit
Pet

The answer to the question would be the set of letters that all five words have in common, in the order that they appear in the words, thus the answer is:
PT

Ready to try it? Here's your definition set:
Wager
Except
Flying mammal
Fly larva
Smidgen
